rComments: Really good at pointing out the problems with our political system, especially on environmental issues. There are no lecture slides, just him talking about broad topics. He does not give study guides for the final, didn't even tell us it's format. Interesting class but a lot of self-work needed to succeed.

This class was not enjoyable for me. The professor is great as a person but there are no slidesvisual aids. Lots of personal stories. I took PassNo Pass and passed. Must read the 4 books assigned. Final was long! A lot of writing... There were times where I felt confused because I have no background in the environmental fieldchemistry.

This is easily the most interesting and pragmatic course I've ever taken. I highly recommend taking classes with this professor, he is awesome. You're learning from a true expert, someone who has actually affected real world policy. All required reading was provided on eCommons. Workload was very reasonable - just one paper and a final.

This professor is so incredibly knowledgable about his field. He will show you the often depressing level of corruption within our government. He'll teach you cynicism and won't dumb anything down for you, but he is also extremely inspirational and will make you feel as though you have a purpose in society. Amazing teacher.
